title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL results in an HTTP response with a code of 200 OK but with no content. This behavior is incorrect as it should return an HTTP error code of 404.
OB: Accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content.
EB: Accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed should return an HTTP error code of 404.
SR: Update the Tomcat 7 instance to correctly return an HTTP error code of 404 when a URL is accessed and no webapps are deployed.
